Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2017...
Injured on 4/27/2017 with a Bruised Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/31/2017 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2018, off Esteban Herrero (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2018, off Jeffrey Ash (PHI)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 5/1/2018 (Going to BRO: P Tim Zimmermann, 2B Estanis Aguilar, LF Andre Winston, 1B Frederick Wansley, P Willie Dubois. Going to CIN: P Fernando Cantu)...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/5/2018 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/5/2018 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 9/3/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2018, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 3/9/2019 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 2/1/2020 (Going to BRO: 1B Pedro Sol, P Maels Tomas, P Randall Joseph. Going to CIN: LF Andre Winston, 2B Steven Mora, P Richard Thomas, P Zachary Pietrzak).
..

Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2021, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,542,857 through salary arbitration...
